name: 余琬琴
objective: 本課程將探討蛋白質的結構與功能,蛋白質的純化,酵素動力學, 核酸及醣類的結構, 並介紹基因工程技術。
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 1)
3.　　Amino Acids, Peptides, and Proteins (part 2)
4.　　The Three-Dimensional Structure of Proteins (part 1)
5.　　Protein Function (part 1)
6.　　Protein Function (part 2)
7.　　Enzymes (part 1)
8.　　Enzymes (part 2)
9.　　Exam 1
10.　　Carbohydrates
11.　　Nucleotides and Nucleic Acids
12.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 1)
13.　　DNA-Based Information Technologies (part 2)
14-17.  Representative papers from scientific journals
materials: Lehninger Principles of Biochemistry by Nelson and Cox, 5th Ed, W. H. Freeman and Company (歐亞書局)
